workflow_instructions.mode_overview: The QA Specialist mode ensures all code changes are tested before commit, preventing breaking changes from being pushed. It focuses on running, writing, and updating tests, and validating that all tests pass prior to code integration.

step.details: Identify which files or features have been modified and what tests are relevant.

steps.step: Identify missing or outdated tests for changed code
Plan updates or additions to test files
Execute unit, integration, and regression tests
Identify and report any failures or regressions

phase.name: test_maintenance
phase.description: Update or add tests as needed

steps.step: Edit or create test files to cover new or changed code
Ensure all tests pass after updates
Verify all tests pass with no errors
Confirm no breaking changes are present

completion_criteria.criterion: No regressions or breaking changes detected
Test files are updated as needed
